document_data.name: Tower of the High Wizard Netheril
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tower of the High Wizard Netheril''' was a mage's tower in [[Freedale]] in the [[Dalelands]].
document_data.Location: The tower lay out of the way, but still close to Freedale.
document_data.Interior: Each of the tower's floors was a single room holding no end of arcane implements: books, notes, and glassware. The first floor held his office, while the rest were private chambers: the second floor was sleeping quarters, the third floor was storage, and the fourth was his secret laboratory.
document_data.Services: Inside, [[Netheril (person)|Netheril]] cast spells for those who paid, and sometimes sold minor magic items or spells.
document_data.Defenses: Three guards protected the tower: [[Major Domo (Freedale)|Major Domo]], [[Fortu]], and [[Deval]].
document_data.History: In the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Netheril called upon local adventurers to rescue [[Taran Goldenstar]] from the [[Tomb of Damara]] near Freedale. He met them at his tower.
